评论概述: Best on the Market—Just Wish It Came in Black!
评论详情: After trying numerous door mats, I can confidently say that the Yancorp Ultra Thin Door Mat is the best on the market! Its high-quality construction and slim profile make it perfect for any door, allowing for easy opening and closing without any hassle. I’m particularly pleased that it stays securely in place, providing stability and safety, which is a big plus for me. What is most important to me is that it actually is UTLRA THIN so that my door can close!!! I tried so many on the market and that feature is REALLY hard to find.  However, I want to highlight that the color is not as dark as advertised; it’s more of a medium gray. While I appreciate the look, I would love to see this mat offered in a true black option. Not only does black complement any home décor beautifully, but it also does a fantastic job of hiding stains, making it more practical for everyday use.  Overall, this door mat is an excellent investment for anyone looking for a stylish and functional addition to their entryway!  5/5 stars
Great mat to put at door for shoes

Serious? They package it by folding it. The rug has large creases in a 2 x 3 pattern. Those creatures stick up too. Therefore if you bought this because your door leaves a tiny gap, the creases will rub or catch on the bottom of your door. It’s a shame because otherwise the rub was perfect for low profile needs. The manufacturer should just roll it with the upside n the outside and ship it in a tube.

Item: Yancorp 3'x4'Ultra Thin Door Mat Indoor for Inside Entry Way Very Thin Floor Mats Fit Under Door Ultra Thin Beige Bath Mat Super Thin Area Rug Outdoor Rug Non Slip Washable  Packaging: Packaging was ok. The mat was rolled up and wrapped in plastic. That was then put into a shipping box. Not much risk of shipping damage unless something were to puncture or cut it.  Material Quality: The top of the mat is made of a fabric described as “simulated linen,” while the bottom is rubber.  Assembly/Build Quality: The mat seems well made. The stitching looks good and is overall assembled well.  Marketing Material: The images represent the item well and there are no signs of misrepresenting this product. The marketing material calls the top “simulated linen,” but I am not sure what it actually is. Overall it is a soft and nice looking material. There are several size to choose from as well as different colors.  Functionality: This mat is a good size and one of the things I like about it is that it is not full of creases like a lot of rugs and mats that get shipped. I get that sometimes something might need to be folded, and even though this one was rolled up I still don’t think it would crease if it was folded. The mat is very thin so it lives up to its claim of low profile. The rubber bottom does make it anti-slip which is also nice. The listing says you can wash it in a washing machine but I don’t know how well it will hold up over time like that. I believe the top material and the bottom rubber are glued together, so many turns in the washer might cause the glue to fail over time.  Price: This item is listed (at the time of this review) for $59.98. This seems awfully high for a minimalist floor mat. I cant say I agree with the price.  Likes: I like that it is light but still feels solidly made.  Dislikes: The price seems very high for what it is.  Overall: I would recommend this mat as it is a nice, good looking and useful mat, but gosh the price is high compared to similar sized floor mats. I don’t know if it is worth the price. If it lasted for years and years I would say yes, but only time will tell. If you can catch it on sale I would say get it if the price is right.

This rug offers incredible value at a great price point. It’s versatile, with a solid color and classic design that would match just about any decor or furniture. It’s suitable for indoor and outdoor use; we set it up as an entry mat from our screened in patio, and it serves that purpose flawlessly. Despite its thin, lightweight texture (which adds to its convenience and makes it portable), this rig is tough and durable. It’s also surprisingly soft, with a fabric that’s much more comfortable than other indoor/outdoor rugs and mats we have used. The size is nice and large, covering our entrance even though we have big double doors. The price struck me as a bit high, but considering how versatile and effective this rug is, it’s worth every penny. It would work great in a bathroom, on a patio, as an entry mat, and more. Highly recommend.

评论概述: Works well to decrease tracking wet footprints inside home ...
评论详情: This indoor/outdoor rug is larger on the screened in porch than I pictured, but I like it even more for that reason. Definitely anti-slip and eliminates wet footprints into my home... and that goes for my dog and cat's prints too. True to its neutral color, and MUCH more attractive than my previous rug. Yes, I would order this rug again ... if I even need to.

评论概述: Thin mat, can be used outdoors, easy to clean
评论详情: We are using this rug as our outside entry mat. This thin mat has a nice tight, smooth weave that helps prevent leaves and dirt from being captured in the rug material. Thicker, more traditional entry rugs often use heavier more porous material that can catch leaves and dust making them hard to clean. The thicker weave can be harder for wiping one's feet. This thin weave is easier for wiping feet before entry. A thin weave entry rug may not work for everyone, but it works great for us.

Perfect size and thickness for doorways that have limited clearance between the bottom of the door and your flooring.  I've been looking for some sort of mat to use at the exterior door onto the patio.  Every mat I have tried has been too thick to allow clearance.  This Yancorp mat fit perfectly.  The rubber backing holds it in place well.  It cleans up nicely and absorbs water well.

I needed an extra large doormat for my front door that was also thin so I gave this mat a shot. I got the mat that is roughly 3’ x 4’. The bottom side of the mat has a rubbery material which helps keep the mat from sliding around on the floor. The top of the mat has a nice solid gray color and feels more like a mat than a rug. The top has a little coarseness so when you wipe your shoes it can catch some of the dirt.  The size is perfect for my needs and the color is nice and solid. It is easy to pick up and shake outside when needed. The best thing for me is when I open the front door, it does not interfere with the door and allows it to open smoothly.

I was a bit confused about this rug.  It is a very thin rug.  The material used on the top part of the rug looks like linen, but it does not look like any rug I have ever seen.  It is a strange material for a rug.  The backing is great and stays in place very well.  Truthfully, I am not a fan.

This mat is thin enough that opening and closing a door over it does not cause it to move. It has a rubber backing and is staying put nicely on vinyl flooring. It does move around considerably if placed on carpet so this mat being non-slip depends on what type of floor it is used on.  I recommend this thin non-slip mat for use on vinyl or other types of uncarpeted floors.

The mat is ulatrathin, but as the surface is smooth it isn't going to absorb water. I Like the color but given that it is very light I imagine this is going to have to be washed.  It does vacuum up easily

评论概述: Excellent quality rug with strong anti-slipping/sliding properties
评论详情: The rug is made to be very durable, I believe.  It has "strong cording" stitches around the perimeter to securely keep the materials tightly together.  The gray color that I received is very smooth with a soft neutral look that will enhance, pretty much, any type of surface.  It looks good on a hardwood floor (see picture).  The backing is very slip resistant -- I could barely move the rug using a "heavy shoed foot".  The rug is made well, looks great, won't slide easily and highlights different surface types.  The price may seen high, but for the quality of this rug, I think it is reasonably valued.

I have been looking for a thin rug for under the front door.  This is great!  Stays put on the floor.  Allows door to open & close unencumbered.  Sharp looking.  Easy to beat dust/dirt out of.  So glad I found this!

It feels cheap but it doesn’t slip around which is good.  I will be buying the larger size but I feel that over $30 for such a cheap quality is pretty ridiculous. You can tell that this is a pretty cheap product made in China, so the value isn’t that great, but due to lack of options for ultra-thin doormats, I’ll just stick with it.
